articles.content: Last February, 51,954 spectators attended the "Match in Africa" at the Cape Town Stadium between Roger Federer and Rafa Nadal. Federer and Nadal have played 40 times, with Federer trailing 16–24. Federer has a winning record on grass 3–1 and hard courts 11–9,… [+1384 chars]
